column1: * Húrin leaves Hithlum with Asgon and six others. They seek Gondolin and accidentally reveal its rough location to Morgoth.
* Húrin heads to Brethil and meets Morwen at their childrens grave just before she dies.
* Húrin is imprisoned by the House of Haleth and accuses them of failing to help his family. A revolt occurs and the Chieftain
column3: is killed as is Húrins friend Manthor.
Húrin heads towards his childrens grave and leaves Brethil.
